sentences.en: A further precaution consists of the same extension and strength properties.
sentences.cn: 要更加小心地对待相同的拉伸与强度性质这一事实.

sentences.en: As a precaution, the marrow houses a standby force of fully developed white cells.
sentences.cn: 为了预防不测, 骨髓中还储存着已经完全成熟的白血球后备军.

sentences.en: Could he not, just as a precaution, move to a place of safety?
sentences.cn: 就算仅仅是为了以防万一，难道他就不能挪到安全的地方吗？

sentences.en: He closed his eyes and composed himself with infinite precaution.
sentences.cn: 他闭上眼睛,极其小心地让自己镇静下去.

sentences.en: He replaced the parts with great precaution.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地把那些零件重新安装上去.

sentences.en: He takes what precaution he likes.
sentences.cn: 他愿意怎样戒备就怎样戒备.

sentences.en: He took the precaution of locking his door when he went out.
sentences.cn: 当他外出的时候谨慎地锁上门.

sentences.en: He was using every precaution to hide her whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他采取了一切预防措施把那个女孩的行踪隐藏起来.

sentences.en: I took an umbrella as a precaution.
sentences.cn: 我带了一把伞以防下雨.

sentences.en: I took the precaution of clearing out my desk before I left, and only my private secretary knows it.
sentences.cn: 我在离开之前预先把桌子整理好了，这一点只有我的私人秘书知道。

sentences.en: I took the precaution of clearing out my desk before I left.
sentences.cn: 我临走时特地事先把办公桌清理了一下。

sentences.en: I took the precaution of locking money in the safe.
sentences.cn: 我把所有的钱都锁在保险箱里以防万一.

sentences.en: Perhaps he obtained it as his last and utmost precaution against evil yesterday.
sentences.cn: 或许昨天他才得到它,以备万一,预防不测的.

sentences.en: They were old, but still politically active, and It'seemed to me a sensible precaution.
sentences.cn: 他们都老了, 但在政治上仍很活跃,因此在我看来, 这是明智的预防措施.

sentences.en: Vets took precautions to prevent the spread of the disease.
sentences.cn: 兽医们为防止疾病蔓延采取了预防措施。

sentences.en: We are aware of the potential problems and have taken every precaution.
sentences.cn: 我们已意识到潜在的问题，并采取了全面的预防措施。

words.tran_cn: 预防的；留心的；预先警戒的

words: keep one's eye on the ball

trans.tran_cn: 预防，防备，警惕，预防措施，避孕措施
trans.tran_en: something you do in order to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening
